Message:
If I become the humans’ emissary,
I can have a chance to see Lucille,
who became the
witches’ leader, again...

I had my reservations,
but to my surprise,
the humans welcomed me
with open arms...

They were acting a little strange...
But, that doesn’t matter.

Because now...
I’ll finally be able to stand
beside Lucille once more...!

At the time,
I didn’t suspect a thing.

Not about the humans
letting me be their emissary,
nor that they told me to only
invite Lucille to our peace talk.

Why did I think
I could trust them...?

What do I do...?
This is all my fault...!
As Lucille said those words,
she threw down her blade...

“Now, this world will also rot
at the hands of the Curse...”

With those words,
the humans shoved the two of us
down into the lake below.
